main.bio: Marthandavarman is an experienced Software Engineer and Developer. And have completed Computer Science Engineering at Kingston Engineering College(Affilitate Anna University),vellore, Tamilnadu, A detailed-oriented, responsible and committed engineer, And have designed, implemented and tested complex web, mobile applications using variety of programming languages and technologies. And also, I'm a quick learner with strong problem-solving, leadership, management and communication skills, comfortable working as a team or individually.Experienced Web Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the internet industry . Skilled in Python (programming Language), ReactJs, React Native , Flutter , MongoDB, Django ,and Complete Web Development( Front-End ,Back-End Development).
